definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Wash your hands before and after instilling the drops in your eyes .
sentences.chinese: 点药前后要洗手，用干净的手帕擦眼。

sentences.english: This handkerchief belonged to the old gentleman, who had simply let it fall from his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 这手帕原是那老先生的，偶然从他衣袋里掉出来罢了。

sentences.english: She bought me a handkerchief with a blue border.
sentences.chinese: 她给我买了块带蓝边的手帕。

sentences.english: Mary likes to lavender her handkerchief.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽喜欢用薰衣草薰香她的手帕。

sentences.english: She held his hand and wrapped the soft handkerchief round it.
sentences.chinese: 她抓着他的手，用柔软的手帕把他包扎了起来。

sentences.english: Frank jerked a dirty blue handkerchief from his trousers pocket .
sentences.chinese: 富兰克慌乱地从裤兜里拉出一条肮脏的蓝手帕。

sentences.english: Cover your mouth with a  handkerchief or clothing.
An hour later, they found the girl's handkerchief.
sentences.chinese: 一小时后，他们找到了女孩的手帕。

sentences.english: She held his wrist and wrapped the soft hand - kerchief round it.
sentences.chinese: 腕用柔软的手帕把它缠起来。

sentences.english: Check this out. Anybody need a hanky?
sentences.chinese: 看好了，有人需要手帕吗？

sentences.english: I think your son must be fond of the printed handkerchiefs with little animals.
sentences.chinese: 我想您的儿子一定喜欢印有小动物的手帕。

sentences.english: He lay down to sleep, covering his face with a cloth.
sentences.chinese: 他躺下，将一块手帕遮在脸上睡了。

sentences.english: Iago. And did you see the handkerchief?
sentences.chinese: 伊阿古您还看见那方手帕吗？

sentences.english: The little girl spread the ground- stone with her handkerchief and then sat on.
sentences.chinese: 这小女孩在石块上铺了块手帕，然后坐在上面。

sentences.english: In fact, lago had asked his own wife to steal the handkerchief.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，拉戈问过自己的妻子偷手帕。

sentences.english: Sarah likes to lavender her handkerchief.
sentences.chinese: 赛拉喜欢用薰衣草薰香她的手帕。
